chapter.title: Deprecated Technologies
chapter.para: The following technologies will be deprecated in the next major release after Red Hat CloudForms 3.2 (CFME 5.4).

listitem.para: CloudForms will no longer support Internet Explorer 8 following the next major CloudForms release.

The SOAP API will be deprecated in the next major CloudForms release. The CloudForms REST API v2 now provides parity with the SOAP API, and Red Hat recommends using the REST API for all integration projects. Technical publications will be made available to aid transition from the SOAP API to the REST API prior to deprecation.
